abstract: Alan Patricof took aim at Carl C. Icahn in a tongue-in-cheek post relating to Mr. Icahn’s recent deal with Yahoo to join the Internet giant’s board.
snippet: Alan Patricof took aim at Carl C. Icahn in a tongue-in-cheek post relating to Mr. Icahn’s recent deal with Yahoo to join the Internet giant’s board.
lead_paragraph: Alan Patricof had a few snarky words for fellow blogger Carl C. Icahn. Blogging on the Huffington Post, the co-founder of venture capital firm Apax Partners took aim at the activist investor in a tongue-in-cheek post relating to Mr. Icahn’s recent deal with Yahoo to join the Internet giant’s board.
